name: Malee Hurra
content:
Malee Hurra was a human female Rebel Alliance Navy pilot who flew a Scurrg H-6 Bomber during the Galactic Civil War, a conflict between the Rebel Alliance and the Galactic Empire. She was fair-skinned with black hair, and, at one time when piloting in combat, she wore a white shirt with short sleeves along with wrist bands.
Malee Hurra was created for a card of the same name for the Scurrg H-6 Bomber squadron in the 2019 Rebellion in the Rim campaign expansion for the miniatures game Star Wars: Armada by Fantasy Flight Games.
